The Tetragrammaton
c. 840 B.C.E., Mesha Stele, lines 17-18:
‏𐤅𐤀𐤒𐤇𐤟𐤌𐤔𐤌𐤟𐤀[𐤕𐤟𐤊] / 𐤋𐤉𐤟𐤉𐤄𐤅𐤄𐤟𐤅𐤀𐤎𐤇𐤁𐤟𐤄𐤌𐤟𐤋𐤐𐤍𐤉𐤟𐤊𐤌𐤔‎wʾqḥ mšm ʾ[t k] / ly yhwh wʾsḥb hm lpny kmšAnd I took from there th[e ve]- / ssels of YHWH and dragged them before Chemosh.
Chemosh, the chief deity of Moab

Moab
840 BCE, Mesha Stele:
‏𐤀𐤍𐤊 𐤟 𐤌𐤔𐤏 𐤟 𐤁𐤍 𐤟 𐤊𐤌𐤔 [...] 𐤌𐤋𐤊 𐤟 𐤌𐤀𐤁‎‎ʾnk   mšʿ   bn   kmš [...] mlk   mʾbI am Mesha son of Kemosh [...] king of Moab.
